content: this fun and festive ornament is a great beginner-friendly project to spruce up your holiday season crocheted in red heart super saver we give you well over 100 shades at your fingertips just create 2 spirals by working multiple double crochets into a foundation chain and then simply twist them around each other and finally add a little bow made with chains and slip stitches this project is sure to put you in the holiday spirit materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m version 1 contrast a cherry red 0319 1 ball or 18 yds/16 5 m contrast b soft white 0316 1 ball or 18 yds/16 5 m contrast c spring green 0672 1 ball or 7 yds/6 5 m measurement approx 4 10 cm diameter
